title: InstallError should point to appropriate log

labels.name: triage
labels.description: The issue needs to be prioritized

body:
An installation of ParaView failed because libtheora failed to install, but many things happened after this failure such that finding the appropriate place to look for the failure was difficult to parse.  The error message mentions looking for a log, but as the failure occurred with the installation of a dependency, there is no paraview-<version>-<hash> directory in the build space, so the appropriate log to look at is non-obvious.

### Error Message
See above.

### Information on your system

* **Spack:** 0.15.3
* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** linux-rhel7-broadwell

This installation was part of a much larger stack, but the rest of the stack has been built successfully before Paraview was added.
